flockfibrestudio etsy com instagram @flockfibre email flockfibre@gmail com 2 the feathered hat kit includes one main colour for the body of the hat and two smaller contrast skeins use either one of the contrast colours for the brim and the other to construct the pompom pattern with the smaller circular needle and your choice of contrast colour for the brim cast on 72 84 96 108 sts and join in the round being careful not to twist if desired place a stitch marker to indicate the end of round work in k1 p1 ribbing for 1 1 25 1 5 1 75 switch to your main colour and larger circular needle and p2sso k1 p2 around round 8 k3 p2 around round 9 sl2 k1 p2sso p2 around round 10 k1 p2tog around on the final round remove the stitch marker you should be left with 12 14 16 18 sts on your needles cut the working yarn leaving a 6 tail use your darning needle to draw the tail through the remaining stitches and pull snugly to close the top of the hat weave in your ends and gently wet block using a pompom maker or your preferred method and your second contrast colour construct a 2-3 pompom and fasten it securely to the top
